title: Power fault causing slower train movements towards Choa Chu Kang on Service B

updates.text: [BPLRT] CLEARED: Train service has resumed at 0918 hrs. If your journey has been affected, you may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdOVNs.
[BPLRT]: Due to a traction power fault at #SouthView, train service from #BukitPanjang to #ChoaChuKang will be delayed. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/SFAdrdHw9j.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Additional 15 mins train travel time from #ChoaChuKang to #BukitPanjang due to a power fault.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Additional 20 mins train travel time from #BukitPanjang to #ChoaChuKang due to a power fault.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Additional 20 mins train travel time from #ChoaChuKang to #BukitPanjang due to a power fault.

[BPLRT]: Due to a power fault, trains are moving slower towards #ChoaChuKang. There is train running in shuttle between #Bukit Panjang and #ChoaChuKang and Community Loop for Service B. We apologise for the inconvenience.
[BPLRT]: Due to a power fault, trains are moving slower towards #ChoaChuKang on Service B. We are investigating the fault.
